General.Name: Birddog Australia Pty Ltd
General.Description: Birddog Technology Limited develops and manufactures hardware and software video technology solutions. It provides converters; cameras; encoders and decoders; audio visual products; controllers; software; keyboards; and other accessories under the brand NDI. The company sells its products via a network of distributors and resellers, as well as directly to individuals and organizations within professional video, corporate AV, and digital signage solutions market. Birddog Technology Limited was founded in 2016 and is based in Collingwood, Australia.

4.Name: Mr. Justin  Mouchacca B.Bus (Acc), C.A., CA
4.Title: Company Sec.
